name: Keep Falling
description:
Draw lines to direct a falling ball to collet green squares an avoid red ones.

Made in 5 hours for 4th Alakajam! in Unity 2018.3.0b5. Bosca Ceoil 2.0 for music and Bfxr for sounds. Paint for ball graphic.

Shout out to Youtubers quill18creates, Brackeys and Tim Ruswick (Game Dev Underground) who insiped me to participate in my first Game Jam.
